1572121659_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body:
Having Africans live with and around Europeans, for example, was a mistake. They lived on separate continents for a reason. They should just keep their continents for themselves. Same with Asia. 
If one continent cannot thrive, then too bad. They have their own continent and can waste it or make it thrive. Its up to each continent.
Each continent had its own unique culture, arts, and sciences (well, except Africa) before they started to get all mixed together.
Everyone needs to be separate.
Day to day living will be more peaceful.
One race doesn't have to put up with the quirks of another race.
Everyone would understand each other because they are all of the same race.
This mixing was supported by well-meaning and altruistic people, but it has backfired on everyone.
Yes, everyone.
No exceptions.
